alert.note: Alert for Iroquois; Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:44PM CDT until June 29 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR KANKAKEE AND IROQUOIS COUNTIES... At 143 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Herscher to near Gilman to Cissna Park to near Hoopeston, moving east northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Watseka, Momence, Gilman, Herscher, Clifton, Milford, Limestone, Onarga, St. Anne, Sheldon, Chebanse, Cissna Park, Ashkum, Aroma Park, Hopkins Park, Buckley and Martinton. This includes... Kankakee Community College, Kankakee County Fairgrounds and Speedway, and Olivet Nazarine University. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 264 and 318. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
